https://tmrev.io/movie/331946-Dead in the Room 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null At a screenwriters' pitch event, a vengeful writer turns the tables on an arrogant studio executive, ordering him at gunpoint to pitch a good story or die. As the clock ticks down, the exec gets a lesson in truthfulness and storytelling, but will he learn in time to save himself? Dead in the Room
